title: Unveiling the Truth about Global Warming
titleDescription: In this web app we'll show you the real impact of the global waming during the last decades, with specific charts with different data from the arctic level to the growing of the temperature.
chartInfo: This chart rappresent the data from
arcticInfo: The Arctic has warmed nearly four times faster than the globe since 1979.
co2Info: Carbon dioxide in the atmosphere warms the planet, causing climate change, human activities have raised the atmosphere's carbon dioxide content by 50% in less than 200 years.
methaneInfo: Methane is the primary contributor to the formation of ground-level ozone, a hazardous air pollutant and greenhouse gas, exposure to which causes 1 million premature deaths every year.
no2Info: Nitrous oxide enhances the greenhouse effect just as carbon dioxide does by capturing reradiated infrared radiation from the Earth's surface and subsequently warming the troposphere (lower atmosphere).
temperatureInfo: Sunlight and high temps also encourage chemical reactions in pollutants and increase smog.
